this_title: Tony Robinson's History of Britain Season 2
trans_title: 托尼·罗宾逊的英国历史 第二季
introduction: Tony Robinson takes a fresh and humorous look at British history ‘from the bottom up’.Instead of the usual stories of the powerful, rich and famous, this is history through the eyes of the common people.We explore their everyday lives: how they washed, ate and made a living; and also how the behaviour of those who ruled the land affected them. One thing is for sure, life for the common people was tough!Each episode covers a momentous period in British history: Series Two looks at Roman Britain, the Middle Ages, the Edwardians and the 1950’s.S2 E1 - RomansS2 E2 - EdwardiansS2 E3 - 1950sS2 E4 - Middle Ages
chinese_title: 托尼·罗宾逊的英国历史 第二季
foreign_title: Tony Robinson's History of Britain Season 2
